name: Capsize
description:
Capsize is a single player card game, take the place of a pirate captain heading for the most precious treasure of all times: the Cap of the Seas. Each pirate is represented by a card, starting with a base deck of 10 improvised pirates.

The combat is turn-based, for each enemy you will choose which is the best combination of pirates to send boarding the ship. Based on the combat result you will be able to promote your crew or recruit new pirates from the 5 different factions in the game: Krakens, Undeads, Dragons, Marines and Shamans, but be careful, if one of the pirates dies during the combat it will be removed permanently from your deck!
Build your deck following your personal strategy and try to become the new Pirate King.

Key Features:

  • Build Your Deck Of Pirates
  • 60 Different Pirates and more of 300 Cards
  • 5 Factions (for now): Krakens, Undeads, Dragons, Marines and Wilds each featuring a captain and a mascotte.
  • Recruit new pirates
  • Promote your crew members to unlock new powers
  • Turn-based combat
  • Roguelike structure
  • Single player
